skills.skill: Programming language (C++, C#, Java, Go, etc.)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize Linux to support hosting game services and game server, including automation for scaling and deploying Docker.
Assist in migrating development infrastructure to Linux on AWS and work on automation for non-game services and company infrastructure improvement.
Participate in on-call rotation and ensuring vigilance during the rotation.
Maintain performance, high coding standards, and efficient code architecture.
Improve workflow and practices, and participate in planning, estimating, and communication.
